entries.title: Video game studio called Proletariat declines to recognize union (lol)
entries.description: Leadership at the video game company Proletariat —a term referring to the working class — declined to voluntarily recognize a nascent union at the studio.

entries.title: Sarah Natochenny voiced Pokémon’s Ash Ketchum for 17 years. What now?
entries.description: The voice actress is optimistic about her future, and encouraged fans to "Be the very best like no one ever was."

entries.title: Even electric self-driving cars may have a climate change problem
entries.description: MIT researchers found that the computers powering self-driving cars could have a large carbon footprint.

entries.title: Tesla cuts prices, allowing certain models to qualify for tax rebates
entries.description: Buyers of certain American-made EVs are eligible for $7,500 tax incentives under the Inflation Reduction Act.

entries.title: The one simple trick to make sure your email gets noticed
entries.description: Don't send that 2 a.m. email! Use features in many communications apps to write messages when it's convenient for you, but only arrive on the other end later.

entries.title: Space Dodgers
entries.description: Space junk is a serious problem and is getting worse. In this game, you’ll maneuver a spacecraft through an increasingly crowded debris field.
